msbt.message: I picked up a great new field guide that talks all about the . They're really amazing creatures. Quick too No matter what I try, I can't seem to catch one of them!
I'll catch one for you!
Don't give up!
Ever since I started reading up on bugs, I've been wanting a close look at . But I can't seem to catch one
Want some help?
Keep trying!
I was struck by a photo of the that I saw in a fishing guide. They're beautiful creatures, but rarely found in local waters. I really wish I could catch one!
I'll catch one for you!
Don't give up!

Lately I'm reading all about rare aquatic creatures, and I really want
I can't seem to catch one, though.
Want some help?
Keep trying!
Oh, thank you so much! I hope you can find one.
Would you really do that for me? Thanks! I hope you can do it!
You'd really do that for me? Wow! Thank you very much!
You don't know how happy that'd make me! I can't wait!
Yeah, it's really frustrating. Maybe I just have bad timing.
Thanks. Guess I should keep trying.
Thank you, I will. I'll catch one yet!
Thanks for the encouragement! I'll keep at it. Maybe I'll get lucky.

I've been wondering how rhinoceros beetles manage to fly, when they're so heavy and have such big hornsIt'd be nice to watch one fly, and try to figure that out.Oh! Maybe you can help me.Can you catch a rhinoceros beetle for me? Any type would work.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

I think those huge mandibles that stag beetles have are sooo cool!I want to watch one clacking its mandibles up close, but they all scamper away when they see me. In other words, I can't catch one.Would you be willing to catch me a stag beetle, ?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Are you like me? Does the sound of cicadas make you think of summer? It sure does for me! I tried to catch some to learn more about how they sing their songs, but they run off when I get close. Do you think you could catch a cicada for me, ?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

I have a favor to ask youI've been trying to learn to make my own sugar-glass art, to use for decorating cakes and other treats.I want to make some sugar-glass butterflies, but I want to sketch one from life first, Would you be willing to catch me a butterfly that can model for my sugar creations? I'd take any kind.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

I was just reading about dragonfly movement. Did you know they can hover in place for a whole minute?I can't even figure out how they can manage to coordinate all four of their wings beating at once. I want to watch one flying up close. Do you think you could catch me a dragonfly, ?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.
I've been researching bugs that carry pollen from flower to flower, and I wanted to catch one to study. But I haven't been able to catch any., if you see a bug on a flower, can you catch it for me?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

I was reading that termites and other bugs are attracted to old wood, like tree stumps That made me wonder how they can find those stumps. Do they smell rotting wood with their antennae?<10_4 /> I want to try to find the answer.So, if you see a bug sitting on a stump somewhere, could you catch it and bring it back here for me?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

I've been wondering lately about the differences between fish that live in oceans and freshwater fishI saw a fish fighting the current to swim upstream, and wondered if that might make river fish stronger.Oh! Could I get you to catch a fish from a river, so I can study it? I'm not really all that great at fishing.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

I've been wondering lately about the differences between fish that live in the ocean and freshwater fish I could use a saltwater specimen for my study Would you be willing to catch a fish from the ocean for me?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.
Please, you have to help me! You're better at this, so I have a favor to ask you Could you catch me ?
Sure!
Now's a bad time...
Help me out, ! I'm having no luck at all catching
I'll catch it for you.
You can do it!
Thanks, ! I just know you can do it. , I can't wait!
I didn't mean to pressure you. Maybe you'll be free to help me some other time, .
Really? You will? That's an amazing offerâ€”thank you!
Thanks! I won't give up. My luck's bound to change.
Please, I really need your help! You're more skilled than I am, so I have a favor to ask you Can you please catch me ?
Sure I can.
Sorry, can't right now.
! Can you help? I'm having no luck at all, catching
I'll see what I can do.
Don't give up yet!
You're the best, ! If anyone could catch one, it's you.
I understand. Sorry for imposing. I'm sure you'd help if you could.
Wow, thank you so much! I knew I could count on you.
You're right! I'll keep trying. Thanks for the encouragement.
